name: DocumentDB {{dbinstanceidentifier.name}} in {{region.name}} is swapping - DD Example
message:
This metric should remain at or near zero. If your swap usage is significant, consider scaling up your instances.

See in [Datadog](https://app.datadoghq.com/screen/integration/266/aws-documentdb)
See in [AWS Console](https://console.aws.amazon.com/docdb/home?region={{region.name}}#clusters)  


[DocumentDB Monitoring best practices](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/documentdb/latest/developerguide/best_practices.html)
